img.alt: MES Staff Tie Dye for Autism 2019

p.span: Seekonk Public Schools would like to welcome you to our website! Feel free to explore by checking out our features including: calendars, news, and blogs. Subscribe to our

span.style: text-decoration: underline; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(119, 184, 255);

span.span: or Twitter feeds to receive updates on school and district information!

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

div.div: I am proud to serve as the leader of our public schools. Our school community in Seekonk is comprised of wonderful teachers, students, families, staff, and community members.

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

div.div: Click here for my Superintendent's Update from the most recent School Committee Meeting. My archived bi-weekly superintendent's updates can be found above by clicking on the "Superintendent's Page" tab.

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

div.p: The Seekonk Public Schools strives to provide a safe, respectful, and supportive learning environment in which all students can thrive and succeed in its schools. The Seekonk Public Schools prohibits discrimination on the basis of race, color, sex, age, gender identity, disability, religion, national origin, sexual orientation or homelessness and ensures that all students have equal rights of access and equal enjoyment of the opportunities, advantages, privileges, and courses of study.
